summary: Two best friends shipwreck on an island in the Caspian Sea and fall in love with the same woman while helping the villagers of their new home.
cast: Yelena Kuzmina|Lev Sverdlin|Nikolay Kryuchkov|Alexei Dolinin|Sergey Komarov|Lyalya Sateyeva|Semyon Svashenko|Aleksandr Zhukov
director: Directors: Boris Barnet, Samad Mardanov (co-director) (as S. Mardanin)
title: U samogo sinego morya
